com.appriskgame.services

Class ReinforcementPhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appriskgame.services.ReinforcementPhase

  • public class ReinforcementPhase
extends java.lang.Object
    Reinforcement has methods required for reinforcing the armies to each player in their turn. Based on certain conditions players will be getting some number of armies before the attack begins The tasks performed by this class are
    • Once the player choose for the reinforcement,Lists all the countries from the map for a continent to which a player belongs
    • Armies are reinforced based on the rule
    • User have to choose the country and the number of reinforcement armies to be allocated
    Author:
    Shruthi, Sai

    • Method Detail

      • startReinforcement

        public void startReinforcement(GamePlayer player,
                               GameMap mapDetails)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        This method asks the player to be continued with Reinforcement phase. If the player choose to continue this will call a method assigningReinforcedArmies
        Parameters:
        player - - player details for reinforcement
        mapDetails - -Object of map
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - -IOException

      • userAssignedArmiesToCountries

        public void userAssignedArmiesToCountries(Country country,
                                          int armiesCount,
                                          GamePlayer player)
        This method check the army count entered by the user and if it is less than the available, it assigned to the mentioned country
        Parameters:
        country - - the country given to players
        armiesCount - - the count of the armies player has
        player - - Current player object

      • assignReinforcedArmies

        public static int assignReinforcedArmies(GamePlayer player,
                                         Continent continent)
        Based on Reinforcement conditions the player will be allocated with some armies to assign to countries
        Parameters:
        player - - The player to whom armies will be allocated to
        continent - - Continent to which the player belongs to
        Returns:
        armies to be assigned to any country of players choice
